resources.string: Hi there. We are about to save the planet. But first let me download the available countries to play.
The difficulty is set by climate changes in a location. Green means easy, yellow normal and red hard.

You have been chosen by The World Bank to save the planet.

Please wait while I download the climate information for %1$s.
You were able to save %1$s. The World Bank have estimated an overall temperature increase of %2$s%%, your actions prevented this increase from happening.
The World Bank estimated for %1$s an overall temperature increase of %2$s%% and you were unable to prevent this from happening.
Move the red items (Non-Environmentally friendly) to their respective vacuums; move or let pass the green items (Environmentally friendly) to the atmosphere.
A thermometer will keep track of your wrong actions, if it fills completely then it will be GameOver.
